reviews.review:
Well where do I start? 
Firstly, I'm very late to the party. This game has been a wonderful experience, sure the puzzles might've gotten a bit too much but ehh I loved it all.
Ana karakterimiz konuşsa keşke daha anlaşılabilir ve zevkli olabilirdi benim fikrimce
The story is humorous and the puzzles are fun and satisfying to do.

Finalmente dopo anni che ne sentivo parlare ho preso la decisione di acquistarlo senza aver mai visto un gameplay e con l'unica certezza che fosse un puzzle game (a me non piacciono in genere) e ne sono rimasto davvero contento. Lo ricoprerei anche a prezzo pieno.
O Jogo muito legal e roda levinho, e o modo tela divida é muito divertido
Jogo que lhe faz pensar e se divertir
ОЧЕНЬ ОЧЕНЬ КРУТАЯ ИГРА СОВЕТУЮ ВСЕМ САМАЯ ЛЮБИМАЯ ИГРА))))
Шикарно, впрочем как и первая часть.11 испытаний из 10
Топ игра для игры с брателлой, но не рекомендую
有一说一。确实好玩，史低4元1、2代买就完事了！

Обожаю эту игру особенно кооп 

10 модулей космоса из 10

One of the best games in existence

*IMO*
My first game that I paid for.
Still a great game. More fun with a friend.
You do not know what you miss until you play it
游戏很好玩就是我玩的现在有点恶心....

Posiblemente el mejor juego de puzles en su dia (Ahora esta The Witness) no por la complegidad de los mismos, sino por la historia y sobre todo por lo bien escritos que estan los dialogos. Una Maravilla
найс кооператив, в одного играть скушновато
Very classic and interesting, need a lot of iq
Muy buena historia y el cooperativo es lo mejor 10 de 10, muy recomendado para jugar con un amigo.
Местами непонятные уровни,неплохой сюжет,а вот сетевой режим стоило добавлять, одни и те же уровни давно всем наскучили.
One of the best games of all time. Keep coming back to play the campaign every few months even after years of having the game, something I cannot say for any other game. Period.
it much good also was 2 dollar

Bhè..che dire? Dopo il successo del primo Portal, il 2 è immancabile...è uno di quei giochi che in ogni libreria dovrebbe esserci! Corredato da una bella storia e da una caratterizzazione dei 2 unici personaggi unica! Consigliatissimo!

if I could compare any video game to a novel, it would be this one. I played the original portal as a kid and remember falling in love with it. Years after this game released, the graphics are still good and the story is great. One of my favorite games of all time.
牛逼的游戏，真上瘾，停不下来

Always a great classic to get back into, worth the price during a sale, and even worth gifting to a friend. From playing the co-op, to playing against each other in custom maps, it's always worth spending hours and enjoying the simplicity of a unique classic.

Great game!
Just love its puzzle.
Amazing game. brings back nostalgia of Portal 1 I didn't realize I had. Amazing story, love the zoom mechanic (so useful!), and the graphics are nice! definitely recommend if you like puzzle games

Other than Halo 3, it's one of the last games I can remember being swept up in the hype. I still have fond memories of that clever, humourous marketing campaign on TV. Oh those slick short films created in Source Filmmaker.

And what well deserved hype.

The excitement didn't stop after having played the game. This game just oozed personality and atmosphere. I love how Atlas and P-body exude charm. The tantalizing mystery of how Aperture Science is somehow connected to Black Mesa. Not to mention the wonderfully clever puzzles.

Oh Valve. I grieve for the developer that you used to be...
Super recomendo, agora tenho mais neurônios do que antes, vale lembrar que da mais QI que você sabia no youtube.
A variety of puzzles to solve in a hilariously dark sci-fi setting.
A challenging puzzle game with a sense of humor, and a sense of danger. Excellent!
intense, hella fast-paced puzzle game, loved every second of it (except for when I got stuck on some levels)
this review is unnecessary, everyone knows portal 2 is amazing
TOP D+++++,umas das melhores historias feitas pela valve
내가 가지고 있던 생각의 한계를 느끼게하는 게임입니다.
There is a reason this game is so celebrated. It gud.
no crei que seria tan bueno.. recomendable 100%
My favorite game ever made. Intriguing story, likable characters, unique gameplay. Truly one of a kind.

Great gameplay, great graphics (for its time), and great story. 

10/10 would recommend.
This is a very extremely fun game if you play with a friend
This game is a work of pure art. 10/10 will play again.
Лучшая игра из всех, в которые мне удалось поиграть! 10 тортиков из 10 дефектных турелей.

A terrific puzzle game that poses seemingly endless challenges from a limited set of gadgets. It's fascinating and addictive. I particularly like being a 3-D avatar inside the game; it makes it even more engaging.
Its a really fun game. The game has a really nice story line and plot twits. I recommend this game to all you who like exploring and puzzle salving,
玩法非常有创意，有很高的想象力，就是太容易晕3D了，自从玩了这个游戏从不晕车的坐车也容易晕了
刚通关单人本 值得一玩
